Articles.Content: A lot of people have come up with tons of abbreviations and other ways to label their craft. A really handy addition, in my opinion, would be to include a craft description in the *Rename Craft* area, just as you are able to add a description to crafts and subassemblies in the VAB. You could add stuff like where it's been, where and when a transfer window it's waiting for is, etc. What do you guys think?
I think this would make more sense within the Mission control building, doing a whole mission plan for the rocket you're sending up, including maneuver nodes, time plans, alarm clock and so on.
